Key Match Events: Virat Kohli dropped a catch in India's loss to South Africa in Perth
Rohit Sharma missed a run-out opportunity as India lost by 5 wickets
Arshdeep Singh picked up the big wickets of Quinton de Kock and Rilee Rossouw in his first over
Mohammed Shami nipped out South Africa's out-of-form captain Temba Bavuma to leave South Africa reeling at 24 for 3 in the final over of the powerplay
David Miller and Aiden Markram stitched a 74-run partnership that turned out to be a match-winning effort for the Proteas
R Ashwin forced Aiden Markram to hit one straight into the hands of Virat Kohli at the deep mid-wicket region, but Kohli put down an easy chance
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma conceded that the Men in Blue were not up to the mark on the field in their tense thriller against South Africa
Rohit Sharma said that the team was just not good enough and gave many chances to South Africa
Rohit Sharma defended his decision to give R Ashwin the 18th over when South Africa needed 25 runs off 18 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: India lost their first match of Super 12 in T20 World Cup 2022, failing to defend 133 on a difficult pitch
India are at the 2nd spot in the Group 2 Super 12 points table
